descriptionHtml:
I AM NEW IN MODDING & I LOVE LIGHTNING SO I CREATE A SMALL CONJURATION SPELL NAME CONJURE HELL WITCH.DETAILS ARE SHOWN BELLOW,I HOPE U ENJOY IT.THANKS.

require dwanguard

Hell Witch (NPC)
Hell Witch Lightning
Hell Witch Ward
Conjure Hell Witch staff,scroll,spell
Hell Witch Gargoyle Army, staff

I RECOMMEND THE MOD NAME -------  CONJURATION MADNESS OR unrestricted conjuration.
Found in the dragon search (pointed location)

update
what are the changes?
 Summon Hell Witch

change 
1-hell witch status and apperiance change
2-hell witch now stands for  1 day
3-hell witch gargoyle army stands for 1 day
4-hell witch gargoyle army has more life
5-conjure upto 3 gargoyles. and staff and scroll has 5 gargoyles.
6-hell witch now duplicate herself (for ultimate help in battle)
7-hell witch now cast some new spells,shouts
8-hell witch hight and weight increase
9-hell witch sword is now balanced
10-hell witch has now vampire lord blood plague spell


first download conjuration madness mod.
after install u have madness perk in ur database
now type player.setav conjuration 100,and then type conjuration madness
there u can u see the park id then type player.addperk ........(id)
that;s all now u can summon upto 21(i tried 21 but i don\'t know how many can summoned).


u can see the video at

Summon Hell Witch and Her Power
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=skelScgdBjg&feature=youtu.be
author: kakashi

files.name: Summon Hell Witch update balanced mod
